column1: Baby Barnaby's////Pros: very good quality food
column2: AWESOME prices (by Houston standards in general
column4: superfriendly (and speedy!) service. It should probably go without saying that
column5: this being an old-school Montrose establishment
column6: Baby Barnaby's is exceptionally gay-friendly as well (and
